front.title: IEEE Guide for Recommended Electrical Clearances and Insulation Levels in Air Insulated Electrical Power Substations

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: This guide, covering three-phase ac systems from 1 kV to 800 kV, provides recommended electrical operating, safety clearances, and insulation levels in air-insulated electric supply substations; addresses insulation coordination procedures; provides design procedures for the selection and coordination of the insulation levels within the station as they relate to substation clearances; and addresses how reduced clearances in high-voltage ac substations will allow for compact bus arrangements and substation voltage uprating applications.
